email.subject: WOW - found something!
email.body:
This server IS military for sure! Just look at those game names...
BUT you found an important game: "Falken's Maze".
If I'm not mistaking "Stephen Falken" was a somewhat famous AI scientist who wrote a couple of books - some classified if you look them up on the libray!
Maybe try find more information about him on the hospital server - maybe we can contact him. Send his record to ME.
Reply when you are done.
Good luck, - Jim (and Malvin)
Seattle Tech Lab
